name: Planktoons
description:
Enter the underwater world of Planktoons and try to find its inhabitants by clever combinations! Which species are there? Besides this small task, your progress can also be shared with the whole world in the fame list! Special relics will help you to reach your goal.

Use your keyboard (w, a, s, d or arrow keys) and/or mouse to swipe!

Support us by buying the game on your Apple AppStore or Google PlayStore!
